settings.headline: Podiatrist Recommended Shoes
settings.body: “Samuel Hubbard shoes provide the support you need and look great every step of the way.” -Dr. Adam Howard, DPM

settings.headline: Engineered for Relief
settings.body: Removable memory foam insoles provide extra cushioning or allow you to use your own orthotics. Customer proven to reduce pain.

settings.headline: Backed by Science
settings.body: 75% of Americans will experience foot ailments. It’s our mission to reduce that number with premium footwear.

settings.headline: Over 10K 5-Star Reviews
settings.body: Happy feet means happy humans. Over 10,000 customers have left glowing reviews of our podiatrist recommended shoes.

settings.title: Plantar Fasciitis
settings.description: Experience lasting comfort. These styles contain features that help alleviate symptoms. Discover our best men’s shoes for plantar fasciitis.

settings.title: Flat Feet
settings.description: Turn flat feet into happy feet! These styles contain features that help alleviate symptoms. Discover our best men’s shoes for flat feet.

settings.title: Neuropathy
settings.description: Premium materials eliminate pressure points. These styles contain features that help alleviate symptoms. Discover our best men’s shoes for neuropathy.

settings.title: Arthritis
settings.description: Engineered for pain relief. These styles contain features that help alleviate symptoms. Discover our best men’s shoes for arthritis.

settings.title: Bunions
settings.description: Roomy toe boxes will save the day! These styles contain features that help alleviate symptoms. Discover our best men’s shoes for bunions.

settings.headline: 30 Day Happiness Guarantee
settings.body: Give your new Hubbards a 30-day walk test. If you are not delighted by their comfort, we’ll refund your purchase.

settings.headline: Trade-Up
settings.body: $50 off a new pair of Hubbards when you donate your old shoes –any brand– to someone in need.
